about_the_game:
Captain Wayne - Vacation Desperation is an intense, bloody, fast-action Retro Shooter about the titular Captain Wayne. As Wayne, you’re equipped with a double barreled shotgun for an arm, countless explosives, and a bad attitude. It’s up to you to go toe-to-toe with the most ruthless mercenaries in all the seven-and-a-half seas, the Killer Whales, while laying waste to Orca Isle in your conquest to rob the rich to feed the badass!







The hot pink-wearing, fish-eating, cigar huffing Captain Wayne is a man who refuses to let anything stand between him and his blood soaked conquest to rob and humiliate every rich asshole around the globe. After losing his arm in a terrible encounter with the "Vampire Whale", Wayne replaced it with his trusty shotgun, "The Captain's Ol' Reliable", and sailed with it across the seas in his vessel, the S.S. Salty. One day, an encounter with a group of evil mercenaries ends with him marooned on an island with his ship stolen. Without a second thought, Wayne starts doing what he does best; killing everyone responsible.







  • Witness a stylized, cartoon gore-fest unlike any you've seen before!
  • Shoot everything you can while an aggressively chaotic soundtrack blows out your speakers!
  • 8 humongous levels that take place all across Orca Isle.
  • Tons of hand drawn, fully-voiced cutscenes!
  • Earthshattering weapons capable of maximum destruction!

With a load of weapons at his disposal, the captain can mow down enemies with his double-barreled palm, rip enemies apart with his devious chain-gun fingers, toss a bottle of the explosive Boom Brew at them, unleash the force of thunder from his palms, or PUNCH THEM ‘TIL THEY’RE PASTE! Power through 8 action-packed levels filled to the brim with the gripping cinematics of Wayne’s daring triumphs and threats. What are you waiting for? Those Killer Whale bastards aren’t gonna shoot themselves!

content_descriptors.notes: This game features the ability to turn enemies into a globs of bleeding flesh via shotgun. On top of this, Wayne has a random chance of saying fuck, shit, or damn, at any given moment during the entire playthrough. We're sorry. It's just how he was raised.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows Vista
  • Processor: Intel i3 2100 or higher
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 1 GB of VRAM with OpenGL 3.3 (GeForce GTX 630 or higher)
  • Storage: 900 MB available space
  • Sound Card: One (1) from: Concertina, Hurdy-Gurdy, or Blowhorn
  • Additional Notes: Her bow 'n stern must sort your cargo and prevent any a tide's turn.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 (64-bit)
  • Processor: Intel i5-3570k
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 1 GB of VRAM with OpenGL 3.3 (GeForce GTX 630 or higher)
  • Storage: 900 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Make sure it can handle our game's OST on 500% volume.
  • Additional Notes: An be she big enough to harbour yer cap'n in the privacy o' his own quarters!

short_description: Captain Wayne is an intense, fast-action Retro Shooter about a sailor with a SHOTGUN for an ARM!! With a cartoony, hand-drawn art style and gory gameplay, you'll have to mow down enemies through 8 action-packed levels to take back what's yours. ARE YOU READY TO RAISE ANCHOR?
